DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect octreotide acetate injection ( 200 µg 3 time daily [ tid ] ) pharmacokinetics ( PK ) telotristat ethyl metabolite LP-778902 relative administration single-dose telotristat etiprate healthy male female subject
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 , Open-label , Drug-drug Interaction Study With Octreotide Acetate Injection Telotristat Etiprate Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female ≥18 ≤55 year age Body mass index 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive , Screening Vital sign ( least 5 minute rest supine position ) Screening within follow range : Systolic blood pressure , 90 140 mm Hg ; Diastolic blood pressure , 50 90 mm Hg ; Heart rate 40 100 beat per minute ( bpm ) Willing adhere prohibition restriction specify protocol Able comprehend willing sign Informed Consent Form Presence clinically significant physical , laboratory , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) finding Screening Checkin ( Day 1 ) , opinion Investigator and/or Sponsor Sponsor 's representative , may interfere aspect study conduct interpretation result Use medication ( prescription overthecounter ) , herbal tea , energy drink , herbal product ( eg , St. John 's Wort , garlic , milk thistle , etc . ) , supplements/supratherapeutic dos vitamin within 14 day prior first dose administration throughout duration study , exception approve Investigator and/or Sponsor Sponsor 's representative Prior exposure telotristat etiprate Use tobacco , smoke cessation product , product contain nicotine within 3 month prior Screening duration study History major surgery within 6 month prior Screening History renal disease History hepatic disease , significantly abnormal liver function test ( > 1.5 x upper limit normal [ ULN ] ) History gall bladder abnormality History endocrine disorder History alcohol substance abuse within 2 year prior Screening Positive urine screen drug abuse cotinine Consumption caffeine and/or xanthine containing product ( eg , cola , coffee , tea , chocolate ) within 72 hour prior Checkin Consumption alcohol within 48 hour prior Check Consumption grapefruit , Seville oranges , grapefruit Seville orange containing product within 72 hour prior Check
